com.philips.cdp.registration

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.cdp.registration.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User class represents information related to a logged in user of USR. Additionally, it exposes APIs to login, logout and refresh operations for traditional and social accounts.
    Since:
    1.0.0

        providerName - - for example "facebook" or "wechat"

      • loginUserUsingSocialNativeProvider

        public void loginUserUsingSocialNativeProvider(android.app.Activity activity,
                                               java.lang.String providerName,
                                               java.lang.String accessToken,
                                               java.lang.String tokenSecret,
                                               SocialLoginProviderHandler socialLoginProviderHandler,
                                               java.lang.String mergeToken)
        loginUserUsingSocialNativeProvider logs in a user via a native social login provider like we chat.
        Parameters:
        activity - activity .
        providerName - social logIn provider name
        accessToken - access token social logIn provider
        tokenSecret - secret token of social logIn provider
        socialLoginProviderHandler - instance of SocialLoginProviderHandler
        mergeToken - token generated of two distinct account created by same User
        Since:
        1.0.0

        firstName - User's first name
        givenName - User's last name
        userEmail - User's email id/mobile number
        password - User's password
        olderThanAgeLimit - is user older than the defined age limit
        isReceiveMarketingEmail - is user opted for ReceiveMarketingEmail
        traditionalRegisterHandler - traditional user register handler

        1.0.0

      • registerUserInfoForSocial

        public void registerUserInfoForSocial(java.lang.String givenName,
                                      java.lang.String displayName,
                                      java.lang.String familyName,

                                      boolean olderThanAgeLimit,
                                      boolean isReceiveMarketingEmail,
                                      SocialLoginProviderHandler socialLoginProviderHandler,
                                      java.lang.String socialRegistrationToken)
        registerUserInfoForSocial methods creates a new account using social provider.
        Parameters:
        givenName - given name of User
        displayName - display name of User
        familyName - family name of User
        userEmail - email address of user
        olderThanAgeLimit - is user older than the defined age limit
        isReceiveMarketingEmail - is User wants to receive marketing email
        socialLoginProviderHandler - instance of SocialLoginProviderHandler socialLoginProviderHandler
        socialRegistrationToken - social provider login registration token
        Since:
        1.0.0

public boolean isUserSignIn()
        Deprecated. 
        isUserSignIn method checks if a user is logged in
        Returns:
        boolean
        Since:
        1.0.0 Its deprecated since 1804.0, request to please use getUserLoginState to get the User login state instead of isUserSignIn() api
